TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but due to a significant lack of rustproofing, it turns into a crumbling pile of iron oxide.

I wish these robots would get out of my head.

Granted. They are now in your digestive system, ripping apart your intestines.

I wish for more wishes about not wishing for wishes.

Granted, because you wished for wishing about not getting more wishes.

I wish to win at life.

Granted. You just won a board game.

I wish for infinite pies!

Granted. But they are all rotten

I wish i could stop crashing

Granted, you stop crashing the Super Evil World Destroying Ship of Doom and General MayhemTMÃ‚Â®, causing it to continue on its course and, like it's title implys, destroy the world and cause general mayhem.

I wish that I had a space roller coaster.

granted but becouse its in orbit it has not gravity and doesnt work

i wish i had a star

Granted. It burns you to death.

I wish for a Vanship from Last Exile.

Granted. A large cargo ship full of delivery vans are now on the way to your house.

I wish for flags.

Granted, but they all are coated in liquid nitrogen, making them so brittle that they shatter when you try to move them.

I wish that there was a epik battul between Morgan Freeman and Gordon Freeman.

Granted. it takes place in Half-Life 3. Have fun waiting!

I wish I was Gordon Freeman.

Granted, you have a headcrab stuck on your head.

I wish for my teeth to stop hurting.

Granted. you no longer have teeth.

I wish that LeonG17 would now realize that I have more posts than him.

Granted, but you realise that post count isn't everything.

I wish for Rage to realise that post count isn't everything.

Granted. I now think that ones Avatar is everything (trololololol)

I wish that LeonG17 would get an Avatar.

Granted, its one that causes you to go into a incoherent rage and try to destroy everything you see.

I wish for a avatar that would do this to Rage

Granted it's this one:

And it's in love with me.

I wish that this^ didn't sound as weird.

Granted, but now all languages sound weird.

I wish that KSP was a MMORPG.

granted but but they both lose.

i wish i had a faster than light ship.

Granted. The laws of physics are not amused by your pathetic attempt to break them. They send their enforcer, The Deep Space Kraken, to *ahem* negotiate with you.

I wish For pie.

Granted, it is of the Arsenic and Cyanide flavour.

I wish to understand the stereotype that British people have bad teeth.

Granted. you read Trekkettes post in Enigma. And while you are distracted chobit murders you.

I wish to have three kerbals in a rover bobbing their heads.

Granted, they are bobbing their heads while falling down one of Moho's Moholess.

I wish to understand why Chobit will murder me according to you.

Granted. understanding the reason is the reason.

I wish for the ability to know who gives out the reputation things.

Granted. The laws of physics are not amused by your pathetic attempt to break them. They send their enforcer, The Deep Space Kraken, to *ahem* negotiate with you.

I wish For pie.

O_O granted but its rotten and swarming with maggots

i wish for a tank
